title: 105_s2047
content: TEMPORARY DUTY SUSPENSION FOR PERSONAL EFFECTS OF PARTICIPANTS IN CERTAIN WORLD ATHLETIC EVENTS. Amend subchapter II of chapter 99 of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule by inserting a new heading. "9902.98.08 - Exemption for personal effects of aliens not for sale or distribution to the public." Participants, officials, and accredited members of delegations to the 1999 International Special Olympics. The curr_chunk mentions participation in various international sports events such as the 1999 Women's World Cup Soccer, the 2001 International Special Olympics, the 2002 Salt Lake City Winter Olympics. The 2002 Winter Paralympic Games and individuals related to participants. Equipment and materials imported in connection with the 2002 Winter Paralympic Games by or on behalf of the participants. Articles for exhibitions depicting events organized by persons or committees. The curr_chunk discusses the culture of a country participating in events, consistent with certain guidelines. The Secretary of Treasury may allow changes to articles for free before 1/1/2003. The amendment exempts certain articles from taxes and fees but not from customs inspections. It applies to articles entered or withdrawn for consumption after 15 days from the enactment date.
